contentParagraphs: Worked in a fully remote distributed "Marketing & Subscriptions" team (16 developers) to develop and maintain large-scale e-commerce marketplace system for publishers using Ruby on Rails and ReactJS.
achievements: Analyzed and improved application efficiency by 8% by optimizing DB queries, tune-up caching and code refactoring
Created 250+ and refined automation test scripts with RSpec to facilitate quality assurance for web-based applications
Troubleshot API issues, resulting in a 25% reduction in API downtime and a 15% increase overall API reliability
Optimized application performance by identifying and refactoring insufficient code
responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain marketplace system, emphasizing performance, user experience, and conversion
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including marketing, sales, and UI/UX designers
Implement marketing campaigns, promotions, and new features on the website
Implement and maintain custom applications written in JavaScript and Ruby
Participate in design and planning discussions, and contribute architectural ideas
Develop API for modern cross-platform responsible SPA from the ground up
Overseeing the work of developers, reviewing pull requests
Monitor site metrics, making necessary improvements based on performance insights
Work with tech support teams to diagnose operational issues and help customers achieve their goals with the product
